output_list.description: Integer overflow in the batchTransfer function allows an attacker to set any user's balance to any value.
Refund logic is improperly tied to state updates, enabling DoS attacks.
The claimThrone function allows an attacker to claim the lottery prize multiple times, without any restrictions or validations.
Relies on outdated constructor naming conventions prone to typos.
The mintToken function allows an attacker to mint any amount of the token, without any restrictions or validations.
The PayWinner function allows an attacker to claim the lottery prize multiple times, without any restrictions or validations.
The claimThrone function allows an attacker to claim the lottery prize multiple times, without any restrictions or validations.
Refund logic is improperly tied to state updates, enabling DoS attacks.
